resources.string: Word not saved because it is empty.

Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry\'s standard dummy text ever since the 1500s, when an unknown printer took a galley of type and scrambled it to make a type specimen book.

We use storage permission to be able to download and save ECD videos from the web portal. Go to your phone settings and allow storage read and write permissions for this application to access this feature.
